sys_atf_step.description: Answer the questions on the form as follows: Vendor Name = 1 and Vendor Address = 2 and Point of Contact = 3 and Contact Information = 4 and Data Types = No exchange of data and Does your organization document, publish, and enforce security policies? = Y and Notes = Security Policies Notes and Does your organization document and enforce HR policies? = Y and Notes = HR Policies Notes and Does your organization document and enforce policies for authorized use of networked services? = Y and Notes = Networked Services Notes and Does your organization document and enforce policies for authorized use of company email, internet, and intranet? = Y and Notes = Authorized Use Notes and Does your organization document and enforce encryption policies and standards? = Y and Notes = Encryption policy notes and Notes = and Does your organization document and enforce policies regarding the storage, use, and disposal of sensitive data by third parties? = Y and Does your organization document and enforce policies regarding the storage, use, and disposal of sensitive data? = Y and Notes = and Does your organization outsource functionalities related to security management? = Y and Notes = Security Management Notes and Do policies and procedures adhere to and comply with privacy laws and regulations related to the security, concealment, and safeguard of customer data? = Y and Notes = Privacy Law Notes and Are the penalties associated with noncompliance to your organizationâ€™s policies well documented? = Y and Notes = and Does your organization regularly review and assess physical- and environmental-related risks? = Y and Notes = and Do data center perimeter controls involve the use of access cards? = Y and Notes = Access Cards Notes and Do data center perimeter controls involve the use of keypad controls? = Y and Notes = Keypad Control Notes
